title: Adbitco
author: Adbitco
content: Quote from: Best_Change on June 09, 2023, 05:18:51 AMWe would like to reward our loyal fans who actively interacted with our service, with a little gift.Specially for our 16th anniversary, we are collecting applications to receive memorable NFTs form our project. Recipients of the tokens can get privileges in some of our future activities.Criteria for selecting token winners:· wrote to our support for any questions between 19.06.2007 up to and including 31.05.2023;· left any feedback for exchangers in our monitor between 01.01.2013 up to and including 31.05.2023;· registered as an affiliate partner between 06.10.2010 up to and including 31.05.2023.· wrote in our ANN topic on the forum bitcointalk between 12.04.2018 up to and including 31.05.2023, or at some point participated in our Signature campaign.If you fall under at least one of these criteria, congratulations, you can claim your reward. To receive the prize, please send us your application for a drop in a free form to our email green@bestchange.com.If you are the forum member, send the address though the PMs on the forum. For convenience, send the link to your message, thank you.Important: Please send us, together with your application, the address of your ethereum/polygon wallet, so we could send you the present on BestChange’s birthday. To receive the token, please do not use exchange addresses or deposit addresses of payment systems, but only non-custodial wallets.If you do not have a wallet yet, you can register it in any available service, for example, MetaMask, OneKey, Brave Wallet, Enkrypt, Bitkeep, Torus, Portis and any other.Tokens will be credited in Polygon network to all participants meeting the conditions during the day of 19.06.2023. Applications are accepted strictly before 18.06.2023 23:59:59 UTC+3.I carry this good news come give we people wey been don join the campaign before and also those who dey active to partake on their 16th anniversary drop. as the information dey above, na so you go take follow instruction and send your details to them, no need for me to reap everything wey dem talk na wetin i kukuma quote am so that e go dey clear for una eyes.I know say e get we brother's (Charles_Tim) dem wey bin don join the campaign before me so i go like make una utilized this opportunity Best_change carry come una door step, and secondly make una join body wish them well 16th years no be 16 days, i know say e no dey easy to run for that long over crypto space. E get some exchange wey don get plenty issues wey no even last for good 3 to 5 years either dem fold or one case to another wey happen closure. like this dem wan celebrate their 16 years on running without breakdown, omo e go good to put eyes for them and see how them dey do, and i go also advise these new exchanges to dey learn work from best_change because them try to fit dey on the run till today. make una join body wish dem well, also tell your friend to tell their friends about bestchange.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on June 09, 2023, 10:21:20 AMQuote from: Best_Change on June 09, 2023, 05:18:51 AMWe would like to reward our loyal fans who actively interacted with our service, with a little gift.Specially for our 16th anniversary, we are collecting applications to receive memorable NFTs form our project. Recipients of the tokens can get privileges in some of our future activities.Criteria for selecting token winners:· wrote to our support for any questions between 19.06.2007 up to and including 31.05.2023;· left any feedback for exchangers in our monitor between 01.01.2013 up to and including 31.05.2023;· registered as an affiliate partner between 06.10.2010 up to and including 31.05.2023.· wrote in our ANN topic on the forum bitcointalk between 12.04.2018 up to and including 31.05.2023, or at some point participated in our Signature campaign.If you fall under at least one of these criteria, congratulations, you can claim your reward. To receive the prize, please send us your application for a drop in a free form to our email green@bestchange.com.If you are the forum member, send the address though the PMs on the forum. For convenience, send the link to your message, thank you.Important: Please send us, together with your application, the address of your ethereum/polygon wallet, so we could send you the present on BestChange’s birthday. To receive the token, please do not use exchange addresses or deposit addresses of payment systems, but only non-custodial wallets.If you do not have a wallet yet, you can register it in any available service, for example, MetaMask, OneKey, Brave Wallet, Enkrypt, Bitkeep, Torus, Portis and any other.Tokens will be credited in Polygon network to all participants meeting the conditions during the day of 19.06.2023. Applications are accepted strictly before 18.06.2023 23:59:59 UTC+3.I carry this good news come give we people wey been don join the campaign before and also those who dey active to partake on their 16th anniversary drop. as the information dey above, na so you go take follow instruction and send your details to them, no need for me to reap everything wey dem talk na wetin i kukuma quote am so that e go dey clear for una eyes.I know say e get we brother's (Charles_Tim) dem wey bin don join the campaign before me so i go like make una utilized this opportunity Best_change carry come una door step, and secondly make una join body wish them well 16th years no be 16 days, i know say e no dey easy to run for that long over crypto space. E get some exchange wey don get plenty issues wey no even last for good 3 to 5 years either dem fold or one case to another wey happen closure. like this dem wan celebrate their 16 years on running without breakdown, omo e go good to put eyes for them and see how them dey do, and i go also advise these new exchanges to dey learn work from best_change because them try to fit dey on the run till today. make una join body wish dem well, also tell your friend to tell their friends about bestchange.Congratulations to best exchange and the green family on their 16th anniversary celebration and there is no doubt in the fact that, operating a cryptocurrency exchange is not child's play and at best, this exchange have proven to be a survivor in every face since their faced a lot of crisis in the past here in the forum and there were able to build io their reputation here on bitcoin talk. There is no doubt also that quite a good number of our reputable members here have once been a part of the best exchange signatures members such as: CryptopreneurBrainboss Igebotz Charles_Tim Sand I am sure this members will have seen this announcement since morning, myself done run summit my wallet make I for no carry last for the matter, Because best exchange have given hints about this anniversary giveaway for a long, finally I will like to congratulate the best exchange team, because it is not easy to come this far being a licensed Bitcoin/cryptocurrency exchange where many exchanges are failing or getting into regulatory troubles, big up the best exchange!

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: This na very gud egberi nai u carry house. But at first I no understand do thing so I come dey re-read am again nai I come understand. And di way me I take  understand am, na for only those people wey don used di platform. Because as e bi like dis me I no understand anything and I don't even know we're to start am. But for those wey don use am go know plenty things so dem fit ask questions from di specific date and time.

comments.author: Perfectbaby
comments.body: Happy 16 anniversary BestChange project and their team. Op please do also qualify to partake on drop, unlike their workers who are already on the good position to earn the drop.
